name: part_000
file: tmp_【#尾丸ポルカ爆誕祭​】激烈モーレツ3D歌ライブパッションバースデー【ホロライブ】 [E2CJV9UqTRM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Wait screen with countdown music for the 3D Live.
Omaru Polka performs the song 'Menhera ja Nai Mon!'

subtitles.original: 誰にも愛されてない
subtitles.english: I'm not loved by anyone

subtitles.original: 自分が好きじゃないけれども
subtitles.english: and I don't even like myself, but...

subtitles.original: 私メンヘラじゃないもん！
subtitles.english: I'm not a menhera!

subtitles.original: 今日はお誕生日ライブに来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you for coming to my birthday live today!

subtitles.original: ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hai!

subtitles.original: ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hai!

subtitles.original: 盛り上がってください！
subtitles.english: Please enjoy the show!

subtitles.original: 全然やる気が出てこない
subtitles.english: I have no motivation at all

subtitles.original: もうすでに帰りたい
subtitles.english: I already want to go home

subtitles.original: お布団が離してくれない
subtitles.english: My futon won't let me go

subtitles.original: 毎日がEveryDay♡
subtitles.english: Every day is Every Day♡

subtitles.original: あー「あーしろ、こうしろ、あーしろ」って余計なアドバイス
subtitles.english: Ah, "do this, do that, do this"—extra advice

subtitles.original: やめて欲しい 人生マジ難しすぎじゃん
subtitles.english: I want you to stop. Life is way too hard.

subtitles.original: オラオラオラオラ
subtitles.english: Ora ora ora ora!

subtitles.original: たまにはなまけたりしてませんか？
subtitles.english: Don't you slack off sometimes?

subtitles.original: ふとした時に
subtitles.english: At unexpected moments.

subtitles.original: 完全無欠の5000兆円が欲しい！って感じで生きていっちゃってください！
subtitles.english: I want a perfect 5000 trillion yen! Please live like that!

subtitles.original: すぐに落ち込んで 泣いちゃうことだって
subtitles.english: Getting depressed quickly and crying

subtitles.original: 赤ちゃんじゃ仕方ないね
subtitles.english: Can't be helped if I'm a baby, right?

subtitles.original: 私メンヘラじゃないもん！
subtitles.english: I'm not a menhera!

subtitles.original: ぴえんなんて言わないもん！
subtitles.english: I don't say "pien"!

subtitles.original: あり余ってる感情なんて
subtitles.english: Excessive emotions and such,

subtitles.original: 映えもし映えない もういらない
subtitles.english: don't look good, I don't need them anymore

subtitles.original: 私メンヘラじゃないもん！
subtitles.english: I'm not a menhera!

subtitles.original: 嫌いだって少ないもん！
subtitles.english: I have very few things I hate!

subtitles.original: 移りだしてウザい あー嫌い
subtitles.english: Changing and annoying, ah, I hate it

subtitles.original: うるさい待てない もう知らない！
subtitles.english: Noisy, can't wait, I don't know anymore!

subtitles.original: 明日の予定だったりさ
subtitles.english: Like tomorrow's plans

subtitles.original: 今月の生活費だとか
subtitles.english: or this month's living expenses

subtitles.original: 気にしすぎてマジ病める
subtitles.english: I care too much, it really makes me sick

subtitles.english: I'm not loved by anyone

subtitles.english: Really, thanks! Thanks! Thanks! Thanks!

subtitles.english: Affirm the correct answer for a menhera

subtitles.english: Throw away the reason that corrects you

subtitles.original: 何とか過ごそう 現代は
subtitles.english: Let's try to get by. In this modern era

subtitles.english: there's no time to be dead, in this world

subtitles.original: 逃げ出すことだって ポンコツじゃ無理もなーの
subtitles.english: Running away is understandable for a klutz

subtitles.english: Huh?

subtitles.english: I won't show you any tears!

subtitles.english: Because life is hard, see, I'm just

subtitles.original: ゆるく毎日を生きてるだけ

subtitles.english: I'm not a menhera!

subtitles.english: Excessive emotions and such,

subtitles.english: I'm not a menhera!
